description:
Jonouchi and Kaiba’s battle reaches its roaring climax with the result of the duel hinging on one final spin of Time Wizard’s wheel!  Will Jonouchi take down his biggest headache and actually teach Kaiba a thing or two about being a true duelist?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Duel pour la troisième place - 3e partie
Road to Becoming a True Duelist
Shin no Duelist e no Michi
真のデュエリストへの道
